mapper.sql: id, receiving_id, status, code, create_time, update_time, create_user_id, update_user_id, remark
mapper.select:
select s.*,r.code receivingCode from storage_incoming s join purchase_receiving r where s.receiving_id = r.id
AND s.code LIKE '%${param.code}%'
AND r.code LIKE '%${receivingCode}%'
AND s.status = #{param.status}
order by field(s.status,'A','P','F'), s.create_time desc
select s.* from storage_incoming s where s.receiving_id = #{reId} and s.status != 'F'
mapper.insert:
insert into storage_incoming
id,
receiving_id,
status,
code,
create_time,
update_time,
create_user_id,
update_user_id,
remark,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{receivingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update storage_incoming
receiving_id = #{receivingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update storage_incoming set receiving_id = #{receivingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
